name: OptionBuilder_createTest
description: Unit tests for the create method in OptionBuilder class, specifically testing the behavior with and without a long option.

test_cases.name: testCreate_withLongOpt
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of an Option with a specified long option.

test_cases.name: testCreate_withoutLongOpt
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of an Option without specifying a long option, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
